ratify.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make a written agreement official by signing it
ratify.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: We hope that the republics will be willing to ratify the treaty.
ratify a treaty/an agreement/a decision etc
ratify.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to make a written agreement official by signing it
ratify.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The government delayed ratifying the treaty.
